icon.name: IconViewHelper
icon.documentation:
ViewHelper to display an icon identified by its icon identifier.

```
   <core:icon title="Open actions menu" identifier="actions-menu" />
```

identifier.name: identifier
identifier.description: Identifier of the icon as registered in the Icon Registry.

size.name: size
size.description: Desired size of the icon. All values of the IconSize enum are allowed, these are: "small", "default", "medium", "large" and "mega".

overlay.name: overlay
overlay.description: Identifier of an overlay icon as registered in the Icon Registry.

state.name: state
state.description: Sets the state of the icon. All values of the Icons.states enum are allowed, these are: "default" and "disabled".

alternativeMarkupIdentifier.name: alternativeMarkupIdentifier
alternativeMarkupIdentifier.description: Alternative icon identifier. Takes precedence over the identifier if supported by the IconProvider.

iconForRecord.name: IconForRecordViewHelper
iconForRecord.documentation:
ViewHelper to display an icon for a record.

```
   <core:iconForRecord table="tt_content" row="{record}" />
```

table.name: table
table.description: the table for the record icon

iconForResource.name: IconForResourceViewHelper
iconForResource.documentation:
ViewHelper to displays an icon for a FAL resource (file or folder means a `TYPO3\CMS\Core\Resource\ResourceInterface`).

```
   <core:iconForResource resource="{file.resource}" />
```

options.name: options
options.description: An associative array with additional options

normalizedUrl.name: NormalizedUrlViewHelper
normalizedUrl.documentation:
ViewHelper to normalize a path that uses EXT: syntax or an absolute URL to an absolute web path.

```
   <core:normalizedUrl pathOrUrl="https://foo.bar/img.jpg" />
   <core:normalizedUrl pathOrUrl="EXT:core/Resources/Public/Images/typo3_black.svg" />
```

pathOrUrl.name: pathOrUrl
pathOrUrl.description: Absolute path to file using EXT: syntax or URL.
